hackathon-requirements:
Submit the name of your hack, your team name, and a brief summary of why your hack is awesome! Feel free to upload a demo video, a pdf summary, or any additional files that help explain your app, although they are not necessary.
Submissions close at
hackathon-description-header: Hackathon at Simmons College - our aim is to create a women-centered tech development environment for Boston area students.
hackathon-location-description: Simmons College School of Library and Information Science
